Sentencas: The Utilization of anode Supported electrolytes is a useful strategy to increase the electrical properties of the solid oxide fuel cells, because it is possible to decrease considerably the thickness of the electrolytes.
Titulo: Anode-supported single-chamber SOFCs based on gadolinia doped ceria electrolytes

Sentencas: We have prepared successfully single-chamber fuel Cells Of gadolinia doped ceria electrolytes Ce(1-x)Gd(x)O(2-y) (CGO) supported on an anode formed by a cermet of Ni-CGO.
Titulo: Anode-supported single-chamber SOFCs based on gadolinia doped ceria electrolytes

Sentencas: Mixtures of precursor powders of NiO and gadolinium doped Ceria with different particle sizes and compositions were analyzed to obtain Optimal bulk porous anodes to be used as anode supported fuel cells.
Titulo: Anode-supported single-chamber SOFCs based on gadolinia doped ceria electrolytes

Sentencas: Doped ceria electrolytes were prepared by sol-gel related techniques.
Titulo: Anode-supported single-chamber SOFCs based on gadolinia doped ceria electrolytes

Sentencas: Then, ceria based electrolytes were deposited by dip coating at different thickness (15-30 mu m) using all ink prepared with nanometric powders of electrolytes dispersed in a commercial liquid polymer, Cathodes of La(1-x)Sr(x)CoO(3-S) (LSCO) were also prepared by sol-gel related techniques and were deposited by dip coating on the electrolyte thick films.
Titulo: Anode-supported single-chamber SOFCs based on gadolinia doped ceria electrolytes

Sentencas: Finally, electrical properties were determined in a single-chamber reactor where propane as fuel was mixed with synthetic air above the higher explosive limit.
Titulo: Anode-supported single-chamber SOFCs based on gadolinia doped ceria electrolytes

Sentencas: Stable density currents were obtained in these experimental conditions, but flow rates of the carrier gas and propane partial pressure were determinants for the optimization of the electrical properties of the fuel cells.
Titulo: Anode-supported single-chamber SOFCs based on gadolinia doped ceria electrolytes
